groups.name: Architect
groups.description: Imaginative and strategic thinkers, with a plan for everything

groups.name: Logician
groups.description: Innovative inventors with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge

groups.name: Commander
groups.description: Bold, imaginative and strong-willed leaders, always finding a way or making one.

groups.name: Debater
groups.description: Smart and curious thinkers who cannot resist an intellectual challenge.

groups.name: Advocate
groups.description: Quiet and mystical, yet very inspiring and tireless idealists.

groups.name: Mediator
groups.description: Poetic, kind and altruistic people, always eager to help a good cause.

groups.name: Protagonist
groups.description: Charismatic and inspiring leaders, able to mesmerize their listeners.

groups.name: Campaigner
groups.description: Enthusiastic, creative and sociable free spirits, who can always find a reason to smile.

groups.name: Logistician
groups.description: Practical and fact-minded individuals, whose reliability cannot be doubted.

groups.name: Defender
groups.description: Very dedicated and warm protectors, always ready to defend their loved ones.

groups.name: Executive
groups.description: Excellent administrators, unsurpassed at managing things or people.

groups.name: Consul
groups.description: Extraordinarily caring, social and popular people, always eager to help.

groups.name: Virtuoso
groups.description: Bold and practical experimenters, masters of all kinds of tools.

groups.name: Adventurer
groups.description: Flexible and charming artists, always ready to explore and experience something new.

groups.name: Entrepreneur
groups.description: Smart, energetic and very perceptive people, who truly enjoy living on the edge.

groups.name: Entertainer
groups.description: Spontaneous, energetic and enthusiastic people life is never boring around them.
